news.title: Lobby Cocoa Club
news.description: Cozy up at the fire in the Anvil Lobby with Anvil’s spiked hot chocolate, a recipe crafted by Death & Co. The complimentary drink is available daily

news.title: Game Night
news.description: Gather around, grab a game and get competitive around the communal tables in the Anvil Lobby to play one of the dozens of board and card games.

news.title: Fairest of Them All
news.description: Dancers’ Workshop invites you to a kingdom far away in this holiday season’s original DW production of “Fairest of them All”. Come share in a magical experience of storytelling through dance, featuring the students of Dancers’ Workshop, Contemporary Dance Wyoming and members of the Jackson Hole community. A DW Original Production Based on the Classic Fairytale “Snow White.”

news.title: Fairest of Them All
news.description: Dancers’ Workshop invites you to a kingdom far away in this holiday season’s original DW production of “Fairest of them All”. news.title: Whiskey & Woodburning
news.description: Every Wednesday evening, taste local whiskey and try your hand at the art of wood-burning. Try a custom stencil or go freehand on a take-home cedar coaster. Held in the lobby from 4 to 6 pm.

news.title: Laff Staff Improv Comedy
news.description: For nine years the Laff Staff has brought zany, original improv comedy to Jackson. Using suggestions from the audience, they perform scenes and games completely off the cuff. Come for fun-filled evenings of wacky antics, uncomfortable situations, offbeat humor and loads of laffs. Ever changing mature & immature content.

news.title: Live in the Lobby
news.description: Every Friday from 5 to 7, start the weekend with live music as performed by local musician Brendan Nolan in the Anvil lobby.
